```{r,echo=FALSE,eval=TRUE}
library(DiagrammeR)
grViz(
  "
  digraph fig{
  scu[label='四川大学',shape=star]
  A[label='公管',color=red,fill=pink]
  scu -> {A,B,C,D,E}
  A->E
  E->B
  }
  "
  )

grViz(
  "
  digraph fig{
  bj[label='首都机场',shape=box]
  bj -> {A,B,C,D,E}
  B->{A,C,D,E}
  C->{A,B,D,E}
  A->E:sw ##A从西南方向指向E
  }
  "
)

grViz("
graph dot{
graph[layout=neato]
node[shape=circle,style=filled,color=grey,label='']
node[fillcolor=red]
a
b c d
node[fillcolor=orange]
edge[color=grey]
a -> {b c d}
}      
")
```
